sentences.en: Apologize to her for your rude behavior!
sentences.cn: 你的行为太粗鲁了,向她表示歉意吧!

sentences.en: Had he not apologize to her , she would not have forgiven him.
sentences.cn: 她(那时)不会原谅他, 若非他道了歉.

sentences.en: He had the grace to apologize to me for the insulting remark.
sentences.cn: 由于说话失礼,他通情达理地向我道了歉.

sentences.en: I must apologize for calling so late.
sentences.cn: 我真是抱歉这么晚了才打电话给你.

sentences.en: I must apologize for calling you so late.
sentences.cn: 实在抱歉,这么晚给您打电话.

sentences.en: I must apologize for the dreadful mistake I made.
sentences.cn: 我为我所犯的严重错误深表歉意.

sentences.en: I must apologize for the untidy state of the room.
sentences.cn: 屋子这么不整洁,实在抱歉.

sentences.en: I shall have to apologize to him, I suppose.
sentences.cn: 看来还得向他赔个不是才行.

sentences.en: I’m so sorry, I do apologize.
sentences.cn: 非常对不起，我真心道歉。

sentences.en: My conscience constrained me to apologize to him.
sentences.cn: 我的良心迫使我向他赔罪.

sentences.en: Others hastened to apologize in public for past errors in their thinking.
sentences.cn: 有人争先恐后公开宣布他们过去思想上犯了错误.

sentences.en: To apologize for leaving so early, I brought you a little gift.
sentences.cn: 为了表示我对提早走掉的歉意, 我给你带了一件小礼物.

sentences.en: Tonight I'll treat everyone to a round of drinks to apologize. "
We apologize unreservedly for any offence we have caused.
sentences.cn: 若有得罪，我们深表歉意。

sentences.en: You must apologize to her for having kept her waiting.
sentences.cn: 让她等了这么久,你应该为此向她表示歉意.

words.tran_cn: 道歉；谢罪；辩护；勉强的替代物

trans.tran_en: to tell someone that you are sorry that you have done something wrong

trans.tran_cn: 道歉， 认错； 辩护， 辩解
